name: The Horizon Event
description:
You’re an astronaut in a scientific Space Station. Your research about wormholes went a bit out of control, and now your own blackhole wants to eat you. 

Run for you life to the escape room by avoiding the station obstacles. 

In order to do that you’ll have 3 differents abilities but each ability can only be used in its own universe. You can switch between universes to use the right ability on the right obstacle, however with each switch the black hole becomes more unstable and and its growth rate increases! Find the right balance between not losing time and not switching too much!
